definition: (bird species of China) yellow bunting (Emberiza sulphurata)

sentences.english: The breath of Jehovah, like a stream of brimstone , Sets it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的气如一股硫磺火，使它着起来。

sentences.english: Sulphur powder has no remarkable effect on soil nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 施硫磺粉对土壤养分没有明显的影响。

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 难怪我上次去阳明山国家公园时，闻到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 一个蝙蝠粪和硫磺小球。

sentences.english: The current  occurrence of  torrent  spurs him to buy fur and  sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 现行的倾泻事件驱使他买毛皮衣服和硫磺。

sentences.english: They are anaerobic or microaerophilic, and are often found in hot springs or stagnant water.
sentences.chinese: 它们是厌氧生物，常被在硫磺泉或静水中找到。

sentences.english: The sulfurous smell of Burning keratin is distinctive.
sentences.chinese: 可从燃烧时的硫磺味识别出角蛋白。

sentences.english: Maybe fire and brimstone and threats of Hell.
sentences.chinese: 也许消防和硫磺和威胁的地狱。

sentences.english: They then use baskets to lug the sulfur out of the volcano, which hasn’t erupted in more than five years.
sentences.chinese: 随后，他们用篮子把硫磺拉出五年多没有喷发的火山。

sentences.english: They were among the more than six-thousand Marines killed on Iwo Jima.
sentences.chinese: 他们之间在硫磺岛死亡600多千海军陆战队。

sentences.english: The high-performance catalyst has heenused in a sulphur-burning sulphuric acid plant.
sentences.chinese: 高性能钒催化剂已工业应用于硫磺制酸系统。

sentences.english: The paper describes a method, based on iodimetry , for determination sulphur in colloidal sulphur-triadimefon.
sentences.chinese: 提出基于碘量法测定粉锈清中硫磺的方法。

sentences.english: The way I've used Sulfurous Springs demonstrates how beneficial multi-colored lands are.
sentences.chinese: 我使用硫磺温泉的方法说明了多色地是多么地有用。

sentences.english: The pungent, choking smell of sulphur filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 空气中弥漫着刺鼻呛人的硫磺气味。

sentences.english: Forget floods and brimstone, it's raptors everyone is running from.
sentences.chinese: 忘记洪水和硫磺，每一只迅猛龙开始奔跑。

sentences.english: The erupting Brimstone Pit in the North Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 在北太平洋硫磺坑正在喷发。
